subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: In lobbying to move his team, E. Stanley Kroenke did not endear himself to the people of St. Louis, contending that they live in an economic abyss undeserving of the N.F.L.
snippet: In lobbying to move his team, E. Stanley Kroenke did not endear himself to the people of St. Louis, contending that they live in an economic abyss undeserving of the N.F.L.
